thread.title: Japan Raids Pro-North Korea Group for Suspected Illegal Trade—In Language Books

author: Alastair Gale
title: Japan Raids Pro-North Korea Group for Suspected Illegal Trade—In Language Books

organizations.name: japan raids pro-north korea group for suspected illegal trade

text:
TOKYO—Japanese police searched the Tokyo municipal headquarters of a North Korea-affiliated organization on Thursday, after arresting a former official in the group on suspicion of raising money through illegal sales of language study materials.
A police spokesman said 45-year-old Chon Ju Hyok was arrested Wednesday for allegedly buying and selling secondhand English-language textbooks and other materials without a license, an offense in Japan. He said police believed Mr. Chon bought and sold the materials in a six-month period...
